documentation.text:
Checks if the asset manager is allowed to do this action with the guard smart contract.
 Then perform the action. If the action reverts, unwind the execution.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes calldata) pure returns (address[] memory,uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,bytes memory)
tuple(address[] memory,uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,bytes memory)
tuple(type(address[] memory),type(uint256[] memory),type(address[] memory),type(uint256[] memory),type(bytes storage pointer))

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(address[] memory,uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,bytes memory)

documentation.text: @dev Helper to decode the encoded callOnIntegration call arguments
@dev Helper to decode the stack of external contract calls

A generic adapter for Enzyme vault with our own guard mechanism.
 - Guard checks the asset manager cannot perform actions
   that are not allowed (withdraw, trade wrong tokens)
 - Governance address can still perform hese actions
 - Adapter is associated with a specific vault
